Special Training Note
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance Archive (GameBoy Advance): Techs: Special Training Note
By John Hawley on Saturday, December 8, 2001 - 10:48 am:

You do NOT have to win at the Special Training to get the skill. You do not even need to hit them once, although the incidence of getting the tech without hitting is very, very low. There appears to be a random element involved.

By Omni Strunks on Saturday, December 8, 2001 - 03:32 pm:

Hehe, you don't have to, but somehow, my Hydra kept on beating the Teacher, EVEN when it was a Tiger with near 500 of every stat with 600-800 of INT, ACC, and SPD.

By John Hawley on Sunday, December 9, 2001 - 03:39 pm:

New data. There may also be a stat requirement. Just had a "Likely" NOT give me a skill. More as I find it.
